website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful message board that you can use at future events for years to come.
pros: Felt board available in multiple colors
Can be used as a shower welcome sign, menu, or shower games list
Sign can be reused for future events
Includes wall mounting hooks, letters, and emojis
cons: Board sits at a slightly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Our way to remember
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. The rustic look of it and the colors. I liked that it came with a lot of characters. I did have to purchase more for what I used it for. My husband and I experienced a few losses and I was able to get creative with this board and use it as a way to remember the babies we lost. I’m sorry if that’s a little morbid.. I’m just so very happy with how this turned out and it how it means so much now. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, nice quality, rotate lines as to not wear out black felt
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this the last couple months for my baby updates. It has worked great, comes with a good amount of letters and numbers, I haven’t been short to create my sentences. It’s a nice quality, I have noted some gaps in the felt from the usage, some letters feel really loose instead of sturdy, so I rotate what lines I put letters on. I like the size and color, the stand is great because I’m going to use it next to baby for baby updates and parties. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scalver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office or home
customer_reviews.text: I love this felt board. The size is perfect and comes with a great amount of letters. My only complaint would be how some of the letters don’t fit very snug on the board and fall out easily. I really had to press them in and not make any quick movements. Everything else is perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Sign in made very well and comes with multiple letters and symbols. I didn't like that I had to cut them off of a plastic mold. The make shift scissors that come with them are sharp and the BLADES FALL OUT of the plastic handles. Please uses caution when cutting!!! Had many complements about sign and questions about where i got it! I recommend this product but they either need to have better scissors or just send the letters and symbols pre cut.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but has issues
customer_reviews.text: So I really wanted to give this a 5 star because it's been so fun to use except 4 a few reasons. 1st breaking oo all the letters from the packaging was a painful process, like it actually hurt to break it off even with that tool they supplied. 2nd reason the back of the stand like fell off 1 week.later so I have just been propping it against other stuff since. 3rd reason the board itself isnt self healing so after a while some slots become too wide to hold the letters as well. The plus side it really does look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amira A

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Toy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a whim as I came across it hunting around Amazon for something else. But it looked cute. I thought it would be fun for our family bathroom and everyone could put different sayings on it to surprise each other. It's really cute! The letters come already punched out. The frame is a chippy farmhouse style. The gray felt is slightly "purple" but not a lot. The little emojis are lots of fun to play with! Over all, I think it's a great purchase. It would also be good for bloggers/Etsy sellers or anyone who takes photographs of products to sell. You could write descriptions on for your products. Very cute! Lots of possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Writergirl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Come with lots of letters and shapes! Super cute, but I do wish the letters stuck in a little more to stay in place a little more snug.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jellison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect letter board.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this letter board! It looks even better in person. It came in a nice box. Everything was nice and neat inside of the package. No damages. There’s plenty of letters, numbers, and decorative pieces. There’s a little sack to hold all of the unused pieces. I love that it also came with a variety of already spelled out words like blessed and family. The board can be hang on a wall or place on a stand. I’m glad I decided to purchase this letter board. I have no regrets. I’m excited to write out different things on it for our second born. It’s better than I was expecting! It’s worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a farmhouse board for a long time. I bought this and am sorely disappointed. The letters are so difficult to work with. They kept falling off the board. What should have been a 10 minute job turned into 30.
customer_reviews.author: Irishgreek

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Stand was broken so we hung it on the wall and the letters do not stay in the felt. I’d recommend a different board.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces and terrible stand
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had opened this as soon as I received it because now I cannot return the item. First, the stand ends are cut in a way that they do not sit flush with the surface the board is sitting upon. The stand is also a bare wood color, which looks terrible with the painted board. Finally, there are several broken letter pieces. Really terrible piece and I would have been much better off buying from Target. Very frustrated the timeframe for returns has passed and I'm left with an unusable item.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but back falls off!
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is adorable and looks just like the picture, however the small sticky part on the back that keeps the board standing up keeps falling off. Nothing terrible and an easy fix - I'll just have to super glue it to the back instead of using the double sided tape they sent. Other than that, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Care1998

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this letter board! It is perfect for our island to liven things up with a funny quote! The rustic white frame matches everything and it came with a ton of letters, numbers, punctuation, and emojis. I attached the frame prop and it's a little front heavy but I was planning on getting a frame easel to put it on anyway.
customer_reviews.author: araS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Super Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautifully produced and packaged product! Looks just like the photo. The board is great quality and feels sturdy. The packaging was really nice and even had a cute twine bow wrapped around the board. It comes with a canvas bag for storing the letters and a wooden easel. There are definitely plenty of letters and symbols. My only small complaint is that the exclamation point doesn’t have enough definition so it sort of just looks like a weird capital letter “I” (as seen in photo).
customer_reviews.author: Dhhteacher95

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and appreciate all the letters and extras were all precut however the cursive words were not and as such one of them broke in two while I was trying to take it off from the plastic frame. So one minus star for it’s durability. The plastic stand that comes with it to make it stand on its own seems pretty flimsy as well so don’t think I will really ever use it that way but instead lean it against something. Overall looks great and am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: faith07

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order very quickly and the packaging was so neat and cute! I was extremely happy when I opened the box and saw how nice the board and the amount of letters and extras that came with it. It arrived just in time for my sons 16th birthday party and I was able to make a sweet little message for his birthday table. I’m looking forward to changing the board with different Bible verses for my family and I to look at everyday. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whimsy, functional and fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add a little whimsy to my office. I don’t intend to change it up too often, but the letters, emojis and embellishments included, along with their convenient storage bag are great. The letters came loose but the embellishments required a bit of work to take off. Other reviews mention a tool supplied to assist with that, however, I received no such tool. I used a good sharp pair of small tipped scissors and hand strength to set them free. The letters needed a bit of strength to get them to sit flat on the letter board, which is a good thing since I know the letters will not fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Groves

customer_reviews.title: Not like what's pictured
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I was sent the right board. The one I received is unfinished wood, not like what's pictures and the pink is very light, also not like what's pictured. There's a black backing under the pink felt that shows through making the felt appear dirty. I do love the board and letters, if it was more presentable it would be perfect. I exchanged it hoping it was just an error shipment but I got the same board. Black showing through the very light pink, and unfinished wood.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Challenger

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Lot!
customer_reviews.text: I searched Amazon for the perfect letter board and decided on this one. It’s absolutely FANTASTIC and I’m so glad I picked this one! There are so many letters, numbers, and symbols. It also feels quality made. I’m so excited to use it year around.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ati

customer_reviews.title: High-quality board for business or home!
customer_reviews.text: This letter board is amazing! It came in a gift box and even included an easel, which I wasn't expecting! The included letters are amazing! I was especially impressed with the photo clips, emojis, and words written in a brush letter font! This board has everything you'd need to start a social media account for a business, as well as keep your family or friends informed. The quality is unreal!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait till first day of preschool Can use this for the next 18 years Also using it for baby shower as well
customer_reviews.author: Jamienicole6977

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with the amount of letters. It came out great! There were lots of extra characters like the dollar sign, cent sign...lots of emoji faces (happy sad angry). There were even commas and periods. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Board! Loved it! FYI, letters don’t come organized
customer_reviews.text: I really love this board but i’ll say the one negative here so another buyer is aware - not enough of an issue to take a star away but the letters/ numbers / symbols come MESSY, like all tossed in a bag so you need to dig and find what you need. I had bought a smaller board and they all came attached, ultimately yes they’re pulled apart but it’s a bit overwhelming especially for a big board where i was writing a long quote.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ann

customer_reviews.title: Letters are all chopped off
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. The board itself is great. I wish the stand matched the board but I can stain or paint that later. My issue is the letters. Nearly half of them are cut off leaving jagged edges. This is on both the letters and the shapes. I will have to buy a whole new set of letters to go with my board. It's pretty disappointing. I definitely don't recommend this as a gift unless you buy a separate set of letters.
customer_reviews.author: KarenC

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of a baby shower gift for a little girl, and it arrived safely and no damage. I was a little disappointed that you had to cut the letters, numbers, symbols, etc. off of the plastic sheets, and it did take a while to do as my hand kept getting sore. They do provide a scissor to cut them, but it didn't work for me - I had to get some heavy duty scissors in order to cut them off. Overall a great purchase but tedious task up front.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this board. The felt was perfect. Nothing wrong with it. The wood looks amazing. Nothing is broken. It comes with so many letters, shapes, picture “clips” and already formed words. Couldn’t ask for a better letter board. I’m using it for my sons birth count down and after that I will use it for milestone pictures + inspiration board for my baby ❤️ PSA- if yours comes faulty, return it! Get a new one for free. No human or machine are perfect. Things happen. Don’t knock it down to one star when it’s an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hood

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!!! What an AMAZING letterboard! I was completely blown away from the second I opened the box!!! Beautiful gift box (even though I bought this for myself). Nicely wrapped up inside. Nothing damaged. And this sweet little postcard of a picture of the sellers! I’m very glad I bought from you!!!! Thank you for the beautifully packaged letterboard! I’ve already created a fun message to my husband celebrating our 30 years together. And the easel inside made this the centerpiece of our antique buffet. Thank you again! Truly a 5 star purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Spainhour

customer_reviews.title: Total hit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for family members who fell in love with my letterboard when I displayed it at a party. Before wrapping them up and gifting them, I opened it and put a little funny message on each board. They absolutely adored it and displayed it immediately in their homes. Really glad I found a quality set (tons of letters and symbols!) that arrived super quickly in time for the holidays. I purchased from a great little business!
customer_reviews.author: Miyabi_Na

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for any room. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I got it for my daughters room and she loves it. She loves when I write messages to her and loves writing messages to her brothers that try to come in her room. The coloring was great. Letters seem really sturdy. And I love the variety of pre-made words. Definitely recommend as a cute decoration for any room. I’ll probably be buying more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last minute for a 'first day of preschool' sign and wanted something I could reuse later (not just the first day of school). It has a rustic look to it but not overly distressed. I gave it 4 stars because: 1. a few letters were bent when opening the package (not worth returning over something minor) 2. The letters are a jumbled mess! you absolutely have to buy an organizer for the letters. I purchased one at the time of this, that came with additional (cursive) wording... Im SOOO glad I did. Otherwise, great product and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration for my newly painted bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for changing up decor regularly. I purchased this to put in my newly painted bathroom to give my kiddos the opportunity to change up the sayings. Super cute and great quality. I like that it includes photo corners and a few words. I just purchased another one that is 8X11 for my son's room for his birthday. I like the rustic look!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sz

customer_reviews.title: not my favorite purchase
customer_reviews.text: some of the rows are spaced too far apart which means the letters don’t stay on the board. also some of the letters have sides broken off so good thing there are others to choose from. just not my favorite purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great but had a chipped letter...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it 5 stars because I love it! It’s made really nice, has tons of letter and emojis and all the letters are precut except for the words. The stand is sturdy and holds the letter board great. I wasn’t sure at first because it seemed a little flimsy but it’s great! Only reason why I gave it 4 stars is because one of my letters were broken. I didn’t notice it at first but the bottom is chipped. I didn’t go through all the letters to see if there were more.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This letter board is a good size, not too big and not too small. It is well made and stylish. It comes with all of the letters, symbols, and punctuation marks that you will need. However, all of these pieces come with one bag to be stored in; this makes it very difficult to easily find the pieces that you are looking for. I bought a storage container with 30 slots to separate out all of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren St. Onge

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to rustic and primitive decor, and more!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought - I bought the larger one to use for my gender reveal (now) and baby announcement (when the time comes) and I will use this one as decor to replace a “rustic” one that didn’t really match my decor. There are some letters that still have nubs on them like a couple reviews say but I’d rather take 5 seconds and file off the nub than sit there and take apart the letters like I had to in the past. A little pricer option but it’s packaged beautifully and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Poludniak

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 12x17 with black felt. I love the large size of this letter board! I’m able to fit everything I need. I also love the grey frame! It fits perfectly with any farmhouse decor. Also, my son really likes to practice his letters while I set it up :) The only negative thing I could say is that a large portion of the “characters” that it comes with are emojis and other symbols, and I’d much rather have more letters and less symbols. But overall I am very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love/loved everything about this purchase! It was packaged delicately like someone really cared and the letters were so easy to assemble and were immediately used haha. I seriously can't wait for Christmas and more birthdays to come around, this would be a perfect and fun gift!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and is ready to give as a gift if needed! I have always wanted one of these for myself and I’m so glad that I purchased this one. The only slight problem that I encountered was the “kick-stand” on the back pops off. However, add a little glue or putty and you would never know! Definitely, worth the price and couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this board! I got it for my pregnancy updates for my baby girl who is due in January! It is actually my third board but it is of awesome quality! I love that the letters come individually already and you don’t have to worry about breaking them off and making them perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Felt letter board
customer_reviews.text: Everything is amazing!! It came in a nice box with a pleasing presentation of the contents. U can't believe how many letters etc. it comes with, besides the 9 cursive words. A nice drawstring bag to keep the letters in. Best of all, I didn't have to detach all those letters!! They were ready to immediately use!! The size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Cute felt letter board
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute felt letter board. Theres a lot of letters, characters and pieces that comes with it so you get a lot of options as far as what message you want to put on it. I got it for my baby shower and ww had it on our accent table. the only thing is that the piece on the back that holds it up fell off and had to tape it so it would stay. I believe that it can be hung up on a wall as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Impressed
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were not super high when these letter boards arrived, so you can imagine my pleasant surprise when I found these packaged with great love and care! The overall quality of the board itself is very nice, but the presentation from the box and twine tied bow, to the handy letter bag and special emojis included was the icing on the cake. I was pretty excited to gift these for my mother and sisters -- now I am SUPER excited! :D
customer_reviews.author: A. Dye

customer_reviews.title: The perfect letter board!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this letter board! I had wanted one forever but the regular pine look just didn’t match our home. I was so excited to find this one as it fits our style perfectly!! I love that the letters come already popped out of the plastic and ready to use. You can hang it or attach the sticky pad and screws and it stands. You won’t be disappointed in this!
customer_reviews.author: Kh2011

customer_reviews.title: Great product ! Great company !
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect in every way ! Its sturdy and beautiful and comes with so many letters numbers and symbols plus shapes and emojis. MUCH more than the more expensive boards ar walmart. Its very easy to use and can hang or theres a little stand you can pop on. Theres a neat little cloth bag to hold the extra letters and such and the packaging it comes in is really neat, very giftable ! Youd almost hate to wrap the box. I was extremely impressed with the product the company amd the fast shipping. I recommend this product specifically and will be checking out their other inventory as well !
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It came in the cutest packaging, it has all kinds of letters, numbers, and symbols. It even has a sheet with the typical cute things like 'thankful', 'blessed', and 'grateful'. I'm not going to post any pictures because everything I've written on it so far is really inappropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful letter board
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! It came with A TON of letters and even some pretty premade cursive words. It also has punctuation marks which I probably won’t use much but I like to have them. I love the farmhouse rustic design. It’s a perfect size and the letters fit snuggly into the slots. Overall I’m very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Concannon

customer_reviews.title: Very cute letter board with a variety of words and letters.
customer_reviews.text: I love the farmhouse look of this letter board. It comes with a good variety of words and letters. It’s fairly small so it would look good sitting on a table or on a small wall or gallery wall. My only complaint is that the stand in the back broke fairly easily. With that being said I’d probably still buy another one if just handle it more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Great board...everything else is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the look of this board and the letters. However, I was disappointed with the stand and the cutters. The "stand" is like a picture frame stand and it comes unassembled with no instructions. I ended up just hot gluing it....hope it holds up. Also, the cutters are awful. I had to use a regular pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Gets the message across
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived neatly packaged. The letters are in a bag and they take some sorting through to find all the right letters, but that's okay. I was pleased that there were so many letter A's in the box. I was worried there would not be enough to spell multiple words. Very happy with the purchase and the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda (Behaviorbabe)

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Comes in a very nice box. Has tons and tons of letters and symbols. I was surprised at how many symbols actually came with it. Also came with a nice bag to keep the letters in. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, dont buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with this purchase, its flimsy and has a strong chemical smell, the board had what looked like dog fur stuck in it and when I went to take the premade letters/sayings off the plastic they snapped in half (I was extremely careful) wont be buying again and it's not worth the headache of trying to return it .
customer_reviews.author: Raeann warren

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little letter boards. The letters and symbols come loose so there is no need to punch them out from a plastic frame. There are tons of cute symbols to give the sign a little razzle-dazzle. Will be adorbs for teen bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put up in my kitchen. I came across a board similar to this one at Target that I almost bought, but decided to think about it. I went home and wished I had bought it. While ordering something else on Amazon, I looked up boards similar to the one I saw earlier. I came across this and was so excited I had waited to buy the other one. This one was $5.00 more, but it was bigger and came in grey. It looks amazing in my kitchen. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: sheri lamb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any needs!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS LETTER BOARD! Number one, you are purchasing from an adorable family and small business which I didn't realize at first, but I'm so happy to support them! I am a small business owner myself, I run a Poshmark and Ebay business and was looking to rebrand and needed a letter board. This one is exactly what I needed! And when they mention it comes with any letter/number/emoji you need, they mean it! It has PLENTY of letters and I was even able to use the cute little music note as a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kale

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this to add to my age tracker photos for my new puppy but I was also able to use it at my wedding! Worked out sooo well! It has held up so nicely and the design options are endless (I was truly surprised at how many letters and fun prices came with the this set!)!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Love this letter board!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my letter board and I am so happy with it! I love the rustic look of the frame. The 10x10 size is perfect and it comes with a great assortment of fun emojis and symbols, not to mention the cursive words! The only thing I could think to improve upon would be to add a matching wooden easel to display it instead of the plastic stand you have to attach to the back. An easel would be so much cuter! Nonetheless, it's still a great letter board and I'm excited to start using it!
customer_reviews.author: Bird lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Letter Board!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this letter board to go in our RV, but I'm having so much fun with it that I plan to order another for the house. The product was promptly delivered on promised date and was securely boxed. There are plenty of letters to make whatever quote you would like and the size of the board is generous enough to accomodate a lengthy one. (See photo) I would definitely recommend this product and the seller, Main Event.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  Fun product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my message board. We converted a room in our house to a bar. We have two exposed brick walls and I have been looking for a cool message board for months. So glad I discovered this one!!!!! I love the true barnboard frame. It looks so rustic!!! The letters come “loose” instead of connected which is wonderful. So glad you followed up with the “tips”. I had no idea what the photo corners were or what the “clips” were for :). Thinking about purchasing these for gifts. Love my board!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann G La

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This deserves a 10 out of 5 stars. It surpassed my expectations. There are SO MANY letters, numbers, and other fun characters to choose from. They even have cute smiley faces, wine glasses, hearts, stars, etc. you can select from. Any combination of words you want to make, you will find the letters for. I would recommend this highly to everyone! Super cute for bridal or baby showers. I am using it for puppy related announcements!
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! One of the best things about it, is that the letters come already cut out so you don’t have to worry about that. I divided the alphabet and the five parts and put the letters in the corresponding bags, that way it’s much easier to find them when I want to do a message. I used the board several times recently, and love it!! I looked at a bunch of reviews before I bought this message board. It’s well-made, and it’s definitely worth the money. Thanks for a quality product! I put four stars for sturdiness because of the easel that comes with the board.
customer_reviews.author: Michele L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high-quality, large letterboard! 😍
customer_reviews.text: I own several different types of letterboards, and this is by far the best quality and my new favorite! It came beautifully packaged, with letters pre-separated (never have I had that before with other boards in this price range!!) and I love the weathered frame look. The letters are smaller than letters I’ve used in other boards, but it actually makes this as versatile as a 16x20 board for longer phrases (you can fit a lot more words on it!) Lastly, I’ve shopped around quite a bit and this price can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten B.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I just absolutely love this. Such a great idea and with all the letters and extras you get, I feel like I got my moneys worth. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to someone looking for an unique item for their home. It really has the "farmhouse" look to it but not limited to that style either.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriellyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for any occasion sturdy and comes with a lovely box to store in.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the packing and personalized company card. I ordered this for Ramadan decorations, and afterward as my daughter will keep it in her room. Love how it can be used for multiple occasions or just room decor, many options with emojis and signs etc, sturdy and multipurpose
customer_reviews.author: Irfan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this letter board! Of course, there’s a million options to choose from, but I would recommend this one 100%. This came with a ton of letters, and cute little cursive phrases and designs (hearts, stars, squiggles, etc). The quality of the board is perfect, love the gray color frame!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Meraviglia

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, great product
customer_reviews.text: Really great letter board! Sturdy & high quality with lots of letters, words, and symbols included. Part of my package got left out and I contacted the seller about it. They responded immediately and shipped me my missing piece which I received in 2 days. Very pleased, would buy from Main Event again 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amber Boop

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this letter board! Apart from the fact that it took forever to ship (the delivery date was changed multiple time) it is an amazing product. It came with a bunch of different options for letters, numbers, smileys, hearts etc. and looks super cute on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yet durable felt letter board!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a felt letter board for almost 2 years but kept putting buying one off. I am so glad I waited to find this one! It is beautiful even before putting anything on it! The letters are extremely easy to use. The extra "sayings" that came with it like "Blessed, Thankful, Memories" are terrific! I love that it comes with the ability to use it as a stand, hang it, or prop it. I highly recommend this board!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: All the bang for such a reasonable buck
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this! The packaging was adorable. All the letters and words are perfect and plenty of extras for multiple words to display. The frame is really cute and goes perfectly with my decor. I would buy again for myself and as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Perez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Comes with lots of shapes and symbols too. The box it came in is very clever and cute, you can tell a lot of thought and care went into this. It seems to be a family owned operation which I appreciate. Made a great gift I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for milestone pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I got this right before my son was born to use for capturing milestone pictures. It ended up being so cute, and I love how my photos turn out. I can think of so many different uses for this sign moving forward (parties, first day of school, first Christmas, etc). It comes with tons of letters, and even some shapes and symbols. I think it would make a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ann Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend not knowing if she would like it or not. However, she was very happy when she opened it and we now have it hanging on another rustic looking shelf we bought on Amazon. We like to change the letters when we have guests over to make them feel welcome (even though we haven't had many guests over due to the current situation). Overall a good gift!
customer_reviews.author: Surfrider0414

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this letter board! Bought it to announce our adoption and it worked perfectly. I will continue to use it in our home for cute sayings too :) Love the frame and the fact that all the letters, numbers and symbols are all ready to go without having to pull them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rios

customer_reviews.title: Mostly really liked it
customer_reviews.text: This item was way better than I expected. Came with so many letters, words and emojis. Only thing I didn’t like was that I couldn’t figure out how to use the screws to attach the back thingy that holds the frame up. I used the adhesive to attach it but I guess I ended up putting it up too high. There were no instructions. In the picture I have it just balancing without the backing but I can’t leave it like that because it falls easily.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Escalona

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and was exactly as pictured. The only downside to the product is that the letters do not want to stay on the board. They tend to fall out a lot so once you've set your wording in place, move carefully. The item does come with enough letters and symbols to write out anything you want!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Y

customer_reviews.title: Great letter board
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly and it was very nicely packaged. We’ve got a lot of letters and special symbols along with some calligraphy words. Some of the letters were broken and for this reason I wouldn’t say that the sturdiness of the whole thing is 100% BUT you get a lot of letters so a few broken ones are not a big deal. Overall I am extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gergana

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My letter board arrived yesterday and it’s even better than I imagined! Great quality board and was presented/packaged incredibly well. I was very pleased that all of the letters are pre cut and ready to go, even came with extra fun cursive words and designs! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Must buy letter board!!
customer_reviews.text: This letter board is ADORABLE. It was packaged beautiful and included a little blurb about the sweet family that sells it. I have wanted a letter board forever now and I’m glad this is the one I chose! It matches perfectly with the rest of the grey accents in my room. The variation of numbers and letters that they include is amazing, and they even include a bunch of fun symbols. This letterboard is the PERFECT gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Murphy

customer_reviews.title: SO Happy with this pretty letterboard!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, great quality letterboard that is the perfect size for our trailer we just renovated. Beautiful, sturdy wood frame and looks just like the picture. Came wrapped in a nice sturdy box with twine around the letterboard. I can't believe all the possibilities with this! There are a TON of letters and a nice canvas drawstring bag to store extras in. I also love all the words in cursive and the many pictures and "doodles" to add to your board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my desk at work and absolutely love it. So much variety to put on the board as far as words, letters, symbols. I’ve already gotten asked multiple times where I got it. Love the shabby chic look. Sturdy. Get it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Great for vintage theater marquee!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use as a vintage theater marquee in our basement hangout lounge. Big screen tv, gaming table, pool table and mini bar with a retro movie theater feel. Comes with plenty of letters and symbols and a handy drawstring bag for storage. Letters stay securely attached to the board. Love that it came with an easel. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LibraryLady

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent letters very disappointing after being so happy with my last one
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed. I ordered FOUR of these last week and they were AMAZING! I was so excited! I ordered one more today... and half of the letters are a different color! its hard to explain but they aren’t bright white, they’re like a cheaper dull color! NONE of the other ones I ordered had letters that look like this?? They were all perfectly white! Here’s a picture notice the H, I AND T!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Bought This Sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little felt board! I'm a little bummed that I didn't buy this sooner for photos! It is so cute with the stand - I can set it anywhere and update it for holidays to make my husband laugh. It was a little smaller than I anticipated but well worth the money. I didn't have to cut any of the letters either, they just came off with a twist.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Giftable!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this letterboard! It was packaged beautifully and when I sat down to open it up, I felt like a little kid at Christmas! I knew I had to gift some, so I bought 3 more and my friends love it too! I will be buying more for Christmas gifts! Definitely recommend! Love everything about it! Haha can you tell I’m impressed?
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I wanted something to write a long message and this is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out
customer_reviews.text: It is the cutest felt board I have ever seen. There are more than enough letters for whatever you wish to spell on the board and there are even cute decals for different occasions. Also, the packaging is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelisse Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart as soon as I took it out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to see that this fell apart as soon as I got it out of the box. The frame just came apart and broke off..and a few of the tabs on the back that keep the felt piece in broke off. So cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Fun messages
customer_reviews.text: The idea and product is fine, the Frame on one corner the staple is loose. so it’s not an tight connection. Other than that i am enjoying leaving messages
customer_reviews.author: Inger

customer_reviews.title: Loved the look! Great price! Some letters were loose on the board
customer_reviews.text: Love the look! Great price! Only thing that could improve it is that I wish the letters had had two places to connect to the board instead of just one. Some letters were loose and would be crooked or fall out over time and they could have used the extra stabilization!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great size and it’s exactly the way it is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how the letters attach. SUCH as,the letter (I) they only have one tab on the bottom of the letter. Tend to fall out. You have to be carefull, when placing letters so you don't scuff the felt. You cannot slide them across. Needs more Numbers for my use. Other than that, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised by how awesome this turned out to be. The box was cute and it was a sturdy felt board. Nicer and larger than the ones at all the stores I looked at and more inexpensive! Came with a stand and letter and a cute bag to hold all the letters I wasn’t using. No complaints. I WILL buy this again. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Armoogam

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this lovely product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow- I absolutely ADORE this product! It is made extremely well, it has a beautiful look to it, the pre-cut letters are easy to use & look incredible on the felt board! The cloth bag is a nice (and helpful) touch. I'm just super impressed! ♡
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Fulford

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I expected and more!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely adorable! It works perfect for what I want to use it for. The packaging was really nice and neat as well. The only thing I don’t like is that, the letters came all jumbled up. So when I went to write out my saying on the board, it took me a little more time to find the letters. It is still a 5 star product in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Wiscogirl21

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought myself this feltboard as a gift to myself after eyeballing them for awhile. Everything from packaging to quality to contents is 100% right on target for what I wanted. Will buy again for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Can use all year long!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great purchase! For one, it's beautiful and then can be used all year long! Comes with tons of letters and also words like Blessed, Home etc in a semi cursive font. Letters come is a cute pull string canvas bag and also the board can stand up alone with the arm on the back that comes with it. This is my favorite purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Very cute! Stands a different color.
customer_reviews.text: This Board is so stinking cute. The colors are great. The letters stay on well. No complains about the sign at all! The only thing I wish was different was that it came with a stand that was a different color than the board. I didn’t realize it would come with a stand anyways so that wasn’t a big deal at all! I might paint the stand black so it matches the board though!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Mott

customer_reviews.title: felt letter board
customer_reviews.text: I seen felt letter boards on Pintrest and thought it would be a cute addition to our entryway. Purchased the letter board from Main Events because of the great reviews and reasonable price. I was surprised to find so many letters, emojis, and shapes. The board is sturdy and overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Just a review

customer_reviews.title: Great quality in a cute package
customer_reviews.text: This product is great quality and comes in cute packaging. There is also a sweet note from the shop which always adds a personal touch. I was impressed with how many pieces are included - beyond lots of letters, there are numbers, icons, things like Facebook or twitter symbols. I was impressed with how many pieces came with it, the quality and good packaging. The box it comes in is great for keeping all the pieces in. I would definitely recommend and will probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Stine

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: This came with way more than I was expecting! So many letters, words, and symbols/emojis. The letters are all punched out already just the words and picture holders are not which makes sense so they don't get broken during packing/shipping. But it does come in a nice box that it can be stored in.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute product ! Only thing is that it can be a bit hard to get the small things off the stencil thing. When you get it off (day a period) it still has the part that stuck to it to the stencil . Hard to explain but it doesn’t make a perfect circle (if it’s a period )
customer_reviews.author: nicole

product_meta.title: Pink Felt Letter Board Set with 12 x 17 inch Oak Frame, 374 Precut Letters and Emojis, Script Words, Wall Hook and Stand - Perfect Baby Shower Decoration for Girl or Mom
feature_bullets: ★ CLASSIC DESIGN FITS IN GREAT WITH ANY NURSERY DECOR – Our changeable felt letter board has a classic and vintage 12” x 17” solid oak wood frame which should never go out of style.

★ NINE BONUS CURSIVE WORDS, PICTURE HOLDERS AND NOTE CLIPS – As a special bonus, we have included nine cursive words – “Grateful, Thankful, Our, Blessed, Family, Memories, Love, Home, Me&You”, as well as corner holders for pictures like sonograms, and 10 clips for holding notes

★ 374 PRE CUT REUSABLE CHANGEABLE LETTERS, CHARACTERS, SYMBOLS AND EMOJIS – All are approximately ¾” (three-quarters of an inch), arrive pre-cut, can be pushed into grooves in felt but can be removed later for reuse. Unused letters can be easily stored in cloth bag included. Lots of special letters including the ?, “”, $, &, #, all numbers, punctuation marks, etc (2x sets of all characters are included)
★ STURDY METAL WALL HOOK AND WOOD EASEL STAND - makes this changeable letter board very practical for either hanging or displaying on a shelf or cabinet. Wood stand is folding and durable solid wood.
★ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – your felt letter board purchase is completely covered. Just contact us if you have any questions or issues and we will be happy to help!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,556 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
